Title: A Goldberg Thanksgiving
Writer: Chris Bishop, Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Lewaa Nasserdeen (staff writer)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: As Erica resists helping Bev prepare their traditional Thanksgiving dinner, Murray worries that he's losing Adam to his ne'er-do-well brother, Marvin.
